amendment.description: To extend and expand the Temporary Extended Unemployment Compensation Act of 2002, and for other purposes.

action.text: Amendment SA 2617 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 2617 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay. 58 - 39. Record Vote Number: 18.
Point of order under the Budget Act raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 2617.

Amendment SA 2617 proposed by Senator Cantwell. (consideration: CR S1641-1649, S1655; text: CR S1641) To extend and expand the Temporary Extended Unemployment Compensation Act of 2002, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2617 proposed by Senator Cantwell.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 2617 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay. 58 - 39. Record Vote Number: 18.
